overview: E-girls LIVE TOUR 2018 ~E.G. 11~ is the fourth concert tour of E-girls and their first Arena tour. The tour went from June 2 to August 5, 2018.  This is the group's first tour since the reformulation as an 11-member group.  A footage of the concert held on August 4 and 5 in Saitama Super Arena aired on WOWOW Live on November 18, 2018. A footage of the concert in Saitama Super Arena will be released as DVD and Blu-ray on January 16, 2019.
title: E-girls LIVE TOUR 2018 ~E.G. 11~
